name: NEON ELECTRON SHOOTAZOID
description:
(i know its not really communicated in game, but you can walk out of the edge of the screen when the barriers disappear)

NEON ELECTRON SHOOTAZOID is a top down arena shooter with a retro aesthetic and rouge like elements! Defeat waves of your robot clones with an ever-changing randomized arsenal.   

After enough kills, the walls come down and you can escape your confined arena and enter into another in any direction. Upon each new room, the attributes of your weapon are randomized as you are given a dice roll of random upgrades. However on each new room you face, the bar required to leave only increases. 

Be careful not to stay in one room too long as the waves of enemies increase in density. Do you keep your upgrades and survive it out, or take your chances and try another room? 

CONTROLS:

WASD: To move the player

MOUSE: To aim

LEFT CLICK: To shoot

Have fun!
